name: camera-rtsp-project
description: Proyecto completo de visualización de cámaras RTSP con múltiples componentes

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:client2 && npm run install:test-publisher
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:client2" "npm run dev:test-publisher" "npm run dev:mosquitto"
scripts.stop: docker-compose down && pkill -f 'npm run dev' || true
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:client2
